# Definition

Following parameterizations were chosen to run analysis and display results:

```{r define_params_local}
slabs_Atl <-
  c(
    -Inf,
    26.00,
    26.50,
    26.75,
    27.00,
    27.25,
    27.50,
    27.75,
    27.85,
    27.95,
    28.05,
    28.10,
    28.15,
    28.20,
    Inf
  )

slabs_Ind_Pac <-
  c(-Inf,
    26.00,
    26.50,
    26.75,
    27.00,
    27.25,
    27.50,
    27.75,
    27.85,
    27.95,
    28.05,
    28.10,
    Inf)

MLR_full_model <- "cstar ~ 
                sal  + 
                tem  + 
                aou  + 
                oxygen  + 
                silicate  + 
                phosphate  + 
                phosphate_star"

params_local <-
  lst(
    Version_ID = "v_XXX",
    flag_f = c(2, 0),
    flag_qc = 1,
    depth_min = 150,
    depth_shallow_max = 500,
    bottomdepth_min = 0,
    gamma_min = 26,
    era_breaks = c(1981, 1999, 2012, Inf),
    MLR_full_model = MLR_full_model,
    predictors_max = 5,
    predictors_min = 2,
    MLR_number = 10,
    slabs_Atl = slabs_Atl,
    slabs_Ind_Pac = slabs_Ind_Pac,
    rCP = 117,
    rNP = 16,
    rPO = 170,
    rPO_offset = 1.95,
    preind_atm_pCO2 = 280,
    plot_all_figures = "y"
  )

params_local

```

# Write file

```{r write_params_local}

params_local %>%
  write_rds(here::here("data/auxillary",
                       "params_local.rds"))


```
